p: The animals were randomly assigned to 4 groups: 1) (N + sham)-group was given sham-operation with normothermia (N); 2) (N + ischemia)-group was given 5 min-transient ischemia with N; 3) (H + sham)-group was given sham-operation with H; 4) (H + ischemia)-group was given 5 min-transient cerebral ischemia with H. H (39 ¡¾ 0.5¨¬C) was induced by subjecting the animals to a heating pad for 30 min before and during the operation.
